#Generated by VisualGDB project wizard.
#Note: VisualGDB will automatically update this file when you add new sources to the project.

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.7)
set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 11)
find_package(Threads REQUIRED)

set(DLMS_LIBRARY_BASE_DIR "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../DLMS-COSEM")
include_directories(${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/include/ ${DLMS_LIBRARY_BASE_DIR}/lib/DLMS-COSEM/include/ ${DLMS_LIBRARY_BASE_DIR}/lib/asio-1.10.6/include/)

set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} -std=c++11 -D_DEBUG -DASIO_STANDALONE -DASIO_HAS_STD_CHRONO")
set(CMAKE_C_FLAGS "${CMAKE_C_FLAGS} -D_DEBUG -DASIO_STANDALONE -DASIO_HAS_STD_CHRONO")

link_directories(${DLMS_LIBRARY_BASE_DIR}/build/lib/DLMS-COSEM/)

add_executable(DLMS_sim LinuxScheduler.cpp Linux.cpp LinuxBaseLibrary.cpp LinuxCore.cpp LinuxCOSEMServer.cpp LinuxDebug.cpp LinuxMemory.cpp LinuxSerial.cpp LinuxSimpleTimer.cpp LinuxSocket.cpp LinuxSynchronization.cpp)
target_link_libraries(DLMS_sim DLMS-COSEM ${CMAKE_THREAD_LIBS_INIT} "${LIBRARIES_FROM_REFERENCES}")
